ActCanadian Environmental Assessment Act
PrecisREGULATIONS AMENDING THE EXCLUSION LIST REGULATIONS, 2007, exempting specific classes of projects funded under the Building Canada Plan (BCP) that have insignificant environmental effects from requiring a federal environmental assessment (EA) and certain projects (e.g., expansion of a public transit facility).
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2009-0088 Publication Date: 2009-04-01
